oestriker was a unique melee weapon wielded by the avatar of Uthgar, the Father of the Uthgardt.
Foestriker was a large battle axe.
This weapon carried a stout +4 enchantment. Foestriker behaved like a dwarven thrower when held by Uthgar, circling back to his hands through the air when used as a ranged weapon. The hammer could never be physically harmed or removed from Uthgars hand without his consent. The weapon was particularly harmful when used against giants and giant-kin.
